answers.answer: Yes ma'am, I'm 32 weeks and 2 days and as time goes on it gets worse. Heart burn I can handle but the acid reflux is getting out of hand I can't sleep eat or drink because it hurts so bad. I feel like my food gets stuck in my chest and I can't get it down. It ***** and I'm so over it.
I have acid reflux pretty bad. It *****.

I had terrible heart burn, even before pregnancy so you can imagine how bad it got as the pregnancy progressed. I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes, forcing me to change my diet, I haven't had ANY heart burn since. I eat a low carb diet filled mostly with lean meats and veggies, some fruit, only thing I drink is water. You could consider revising your diet for the few remaining weeks and see if it helps.
I was having the same problem and my ob gave me zantac. It has done wonders for my acid reflux. I couldn't even sleep because of it and now it's like it's disappeared.

question: I'm currently 34wks 6days also a ftm and all throughout my pregnancy I've had heartburn. But with the time getting closer for her to arrive my heartburn as gotten extremely WORST! I constantly feel the need to vomit. I can't eat without feeling sick after. Is there anyone else going through the same thing as me?
title: Feeling worst as time gets near.
